title.rendered: Move to Australia with University of Adelaide Research Scholarship 2024

content.rendered:
University of Adelaide Research Scholarship – If you are looking for a University offering Research Scholarship in Chemical Engineering, opportunity is available at University of Adelaide, Australia. The University is currently inviting applications from enthusiastic and outstanding individuals for the University of Adelaide Research Scholarship in the School of Chemical Engineering, beginning in the academic session of 2024.

Scholarship Coverage

The Research Scholarship is a prestigious award, attracting a high level of competition among Postgraduate Research candidates. This scholarship opportunity is open to both domestic and international students, and it offers a financial support of $32,500 (based on the 2024 rate) for a duration of up to 3.5 years.

About the University of Adelaide Research Scholarship

This CSIRO – University of Adelaide jointly funded PhD opportunity has been established to support a full-time PhD student who is looking to commence research in the applied fields of physics, geology or chemistry. This project includes a 3-month CSIRO internship.

Overview

Scholarship Sponsor(s): University of Adelaide, Australia

Host Institution(s): University of Adelaide, Australia

Scholarship Worth: $32,500 (2024 rate)

Application Deadline: June 30, 2024

Number of Awards: Several

Study Level: PhD

Nationality: Domestic & International Students

Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible for the Scholarship, applicants are expected to meet the following conditions:

  • Applicants must be Australian citizens, permanent residents of Australia or international students
  • Be acceptable as candidates for a PhD degree at the University of Adelaide. View PhD eligibility requirements
  • Hold Australian First Class Honours, or equivalent
  • Be able to commence study in October 1, 2024

Scholarship Benefits

Successful applicants for University of Adelaide Research CSIRO Supplementary Scholarship will receive the following benefits:

  • University of Adelaide Research Scholarship – $32,500 (2024 rate).
  • Details of terms and/or benefits can be found in the Conditions of Award.

Application Procedures 

How-to-Apply: Interested applicants for CSIRO Supplementary Scholarship should submit Expressions of interest to Associate Professor Tony Hooker by email (tony.hooker@adelaide.edu.au) with the name of scholarship in the subject heading.

Documents Required

Please ensure you include all of the following documents:

  • Degree certificates (testamurs)
  • Academic transcripts
  • Translations of non-English documentation
  • Evidence of English language proficiency
  • Curriculum vitae

Visit the Official Website for Further Details
